version_description:
• Minor bug fixes
• Want to receive more relevant push notifications? We’ve been busy updating our software to allow just this! All you have to do is make sure you have opted in to receive push notifications so we can keep you informed of our exclusive Nectar offers and updates!

• Minor bug fixes

Thanks for using Nectar! To make our app even better, we’ve now added a new way for you to keep up to date with the best of Nectar so you don’t miss out. Simply opt-in to receive notifications from Nectar and we’ll let you know when we have new offers, competitions and much more. Our app also has a brand new wallet so when you opt-in to offers from Caffé Nero, PizzaExpress, Photobox and Virgin trains, you can find them easily.

Simply opt-in to receive notifications from Nectar and we’ll let you know when we have new offers, competitions and much more. Our app also has a brand new wallet so when you opt-in to offers from Caffé Nero, PizzaExpress, Photobox and Virgin trains, you can find them easily.

Thanks for using Nectar! To make our app even better, we’ve now added a new way for you to keep up to date with the best of Nectar so you don’t miss out. Simply opt-in to receive notifications from Nectar and we’ll let you know when we have new offers, competitions and much more. Our app also has a brand new wallet so when you opt-in to offers from Caffé Nero, PizzaExpress, Photobox and Virgin trains, you can find them easily.

· We’ve redesigned the screens before you login to highlight the best of Nectar: top brands to collect and spend with and weekly offers
· Improvements to the wallet:
* You can now mark eCodes as used (Thank you for the feedback, JimT34) :-)
* Better descriptions when you redeem rewards in the app and when you view them in the eCodes wallet after

· We’ve redesigned the screens before you login to highlight the best of Nectar: top brands to collect and spend with and weekly offers

* Better descriptions when you redeem rewards in the app and when you view them in the eCodes wallet after

· We’ve redesigned the screens before you login to highlight the best of Nectar: top brands to collect and spend with and weekly offers

* You can now mark eCodes as used (Thank you for the feedback, JimT34) :-)
* Better descriptions when you redeem rewards in the app and when you view them in the eCodes wallet after

• Easy, secure fingerprint login with Touch ID - We know that some users are getting logged out more than intended. We’re working on a fix for this and so this feature makes it even easier to get back in without having to find your card number and keep an eye on your offers and points!
• In app Wallet - View and use your Offers (as well as eCodes) - When you load an offer to card (opt in) it’s stored in the Offers Wallet
• Surprise! Look out for offers sent via instant notifications, just for you (keep Push Notifications on to receive them!)
• Lots more improvements in upcoming releases (roughly every 8 weeks)
• A few bugs fixed

• Surprise! Look out for offers sent via instant notifications, just for you (keep Push Notifications on to receive them!)
• Lots more improvements in upcoming releases (roughly every 8 weeks)
• A few bugs fixed

• Easy, secure fingerprint login with Touch ID - We know that some users are getting logged out more than intended. We’re working on a fix for this and so this feature makes it even easier to get back in without having to find your card number and keep an eye on your offers and points!

· Easy, secure fingerprint login with Touch ID - We know that some users are getting logged out more than intended so here’s a workaround.
· In app Wallet – Save your offers and redeemed eCodes into a Wallet - When you load an offer to card (opt in) it’s stored in there
· Offers in your Wallet will now tell you when the points have been awarded
· Improved the Offers Wallet layout so it’s more visual and helps you recognise which offer you’re looking at more quickly
· You can now add a profile photo, give your Nectar app the personal touch!
· eCodes Wallet no longer hides valid codes a day too early (sorry!)
· Squashed a few bugs

- Offers from our online partners no longer have to go via nectar.com, just tap the 'Shop now' button in the offer and start shopping to collect your points (don't forget to come back via the app each time you shop)
- We've added a search bar to the offers screen that allows you to find offers from partners quickly
- We've added an inbox to keep you updated on the latest news and events
- Fixed an issue which caused the app to quit unexpectedly

- We've added an inbox to keep you updated on the latest news and events
- Fixed an issue which caused the app to quit unexpectedly

- You can now search and collect points from 100's of online brands! Just tap the search bar and choose More Offers
- Enabled 2-Step Login to make sure your account is more secure
- We've added the card number to your wallet so it's handy if you need it
- Want tell us about an idea for the app? You can now provide feedback from the settings screen

- We've added QR codes to vouchers in the wallet, so now  when you are at the till, just show your QR code to be scanned – easy!

- You can now redeem any Nectar rewards in the app when they are shown in the offers section, no need to go via nectar.com and log in a second time
- 3D Touch has been added to the app icon on the homescreen, so you can jump quickly to a section of the app e.g. Wallet
- We've added a Today widget so that you can access your redeemed eVouchers quickly
- You can now hide the keyboard when searching in the 'More offers' section (tap the search bar to see all of our online brands)

- Added a link in the settings to the Account section on nectar.com
- Made images on product offers larger, so you can actually see the product
- Added Dynamic Type Support to help with accessibility
- Added 3D Touch to the offer stream; you can now see more details by gently pressing the screen

- We've updated the Nectar App with a little polish to make it flow better
- Added some new types of offers. Look out for some new ways to collect points!
- When you get points added from one of our online brands 30+ days after you've made your purchase, the mini statement will now display the Brand name, rather than 'eShops'

We want to make it as easy as possible for you to get to your weekly offers, so we’ve improved the log in screen as well as making it easier for you to request a new password in case it slips your mind.

It might be our last update for 2019 but we’ve got big things planned for next year.

This update brings some festive cheer to our wonderful swipe and win game - notice it change over the next few days.

Prefer text a bit bigger? We’ve increased support for larger text across the app. Turn it on within your iPhone's ‘Accessibility’ settings. This feature is still in beta, which means it’s not quite perfect but we’ll continue to improve it next year. If you have any feedback, we’d love to hear from you, send an email to our team at accessibility@nectar.com.

We did a bit of the usual bug squashing too.

Thanks for being part of Nectar - we’ll see in you in 2020.

With this update we’re making it super simple to leave feedback about the Nectar app. Every message goes directly to our product team and helps to shape your future experience.

Things you can do:
1. Tell us about a bug
2. Give app feedback
3. Suggest a new feature
4. Rate the app

Where can I find it?:
Tap on the account icon in the top right of the “Home” page and then choose “Give us feedback”.

If you need to speak with someone or get help right now, it’s always best to contact us instead.

Thanks for being part of Nectar - we can’t wait to hear from you.

With this update we’re making it super simple to leave feedback about the Nectar app. Every message goes directly to our product team and helps to shape your future experience.

Things you can do:
1. Tell us about a bug
2. Give app feedback
3. Suggest a new feature
4. Rate the app

Where can I find it?:
Tap on the account icon in the top right of the “Home” page and then choose “Give us feedback”.

If you need to speak with someone or get help right now, it’s always best to contact us instead.

Thanks for being part of Nectar - we can’t wait to hear from you.

With this update we’re bringing you two bigger improvements...

Nectar isn’t just about collecting points, that’s why we’re making it easier to find out were you can spend them. Scroll through some of our featured partners or tap the “Show all” button to get them all on one page. There’s a filter to help sort partners between online and in-store too.

Where can I find this?:

Scroll down to the end of your “Home” page. That’s the new home for all things to do with spending.

What’s next for spend?:

We’ll be releasing another update in the near future packed with even more improvements.
We’re giving you more control of how you organise your “Saved” offers too. You can now use filters to:

1. Sort your offers by when you saved them or when you need to use them by.
2. Show Sainsbury’s offers, Partner offers, Vouchers or any combination of the three.

Where can I find this?:

At the top of your “Saved” page you’ll notice a shiny new button called “Filters”.
As always, we’d love to get your feedback. Just tap on the “Account” icon in the top right of your “Home” page and then choose “Give us feedback”.

Thanks for being part of Nectar.

With this release we’re bringing you more great improvements for iOS:

1. “Activity" has moved into the bottom navigation and it’s now just one tap away.

2. We’ve improved the design of “Toasts” - they are little messages that pop up on the screen to confirm things like changing your address. We also use them to message you when the app has no internet connection and for unexpected errors (we do try to avoid those). Easily dismiss them by swiping left, right or down.

3. Our “Swipe and win” game is a great way to boost you balance when shopping with
Sainsbury’s. Prefer to not play? That’s ok too. You can now turn these games off from within your “Account” section, located in the top right corner of your “Home” page

As always, we’d love to get your feedback. Just tap on the “Account” icon in the top right of your “Home” page and then choose “Give us feedback”.

Thanks for being part of Nectar.

With this update we’re bringing you two small improvements:

Our friends at Sainsbury’s have improved the quality of grocery product images, so we've built a zoom feature to make the most of them.

How does it work?:
Tap on a Sainsbury’s food offer to open the detail page. Then tap once on the product image to make it full screen. Zoom in and enjoy!

We’re always thinking of ways to make the Nectar experience more inclusive. If you have motion sensitivity or just prefer a simpler experience, we’ve got it covered. You can now swap our brand animations for static images.

How does it work?:
Tap on the “Account” icon in the top right corner of your “Home” page and then select “Settings”. You’ll find the “Animations” toggle at the bottom of the page.

Oh and If you have “Reduce Motion” toggled on in your iPhone’s “Accessibility” settings - we’ll respect that too.

Thanks for being part of Nectar!

At Nectar we care about your privacy. With this update we’re making some important updates to our Privacy Policy and Cookies. We use data from your device to help give you the best app experience. When you open your updated app, you’ll have the option to read our Privacy Policy and manage your Data Sharing settings. We’ve also added a new Privacy section within Account, so you can read our policy and update your settings at any time, with just a few taps.
